omen-cards.flavor: A skull, cracked and missing teeth.
omen-cards.description:
If you take mental damage, you can take all of it as physical damage instead.
Make a haunt roll now.

You roll 2 additional dice (maximum of 8 dice) when making a Might attack with this weapon. You can't use another weapon while you're using this one.
Make a haunt roll now.

omen-cards.flavor: This mangy dog seems friendly. At least you hope it is.
omen-cards.description:
Gain 1 Might and 1 Sanity now. Lose 1 Might and 1 Sanity if you lose custody of the dog.
Take a small monster token to represent the Dog. Put it in your room. Once during your turn, the Dog can move up to 6 spaces away, using doors and stairs, and then return. It can pick up, carry, and/or drop 1 item before it returns. The Dog isn't slowed by opponents. It can't use one-way passages or rooms that require a roll. It can't carry items that slow movement.
This omen can't be dropped, traded, or stolen.
Make a haunt roll now.

omen-cards.flavor: A growl, the scent of death. Pain. Darkness. Gone.
omen-cards.description:
When you draw this card, something bites you. The player on your right rolls a Might 4 attack against you for the mysterious something (before it runs away into the darkness). You defend against this attack as normal, by rolling dice equal to your Might.
This omen can't be dropped, traded, or stolen.
Make a haunt roll now.

Gain 2 Might and lose 1 Sanity now. Lose 2 Might and gain 1 Sanity if you lost custody of the madman.
This omen can't be dropped, traded, or stolen.
Make a haunt roll now.

omen-cards.flavor: A girl. Alone. Trapped. You free her!
omen-cards.description:
Gain 1 Sanity and 1 Knowledge now. Lose 1 Sanity and 1 Knowledge if you lose custody of the Girl.
This omen can't be dropped, traded, or stolen.
Make a haunt roll now.

omen-cards.flavor: A diary or lab notes? Ancient script or modern ravings?
omen-cards.description:
Gain 2 Knowledge now. Lose 2 Knowledge if you lose the Book.
Make a haunt roll now.

omen-cards.flavor: A symbol of calm in an unsettling world.
omen-cards.description:
Gain 2 Sanity now. Lose 2 Sanity if you lost the Holy Symbol.
Make a haunt roll now.

event-cards.flavor: What's around your ankle? A bug? A tenticle? A dead hand clawing?
event-cards.description:
You much attempt a speed roll.
4+ You break free. Gain 1 Speed.
1-3 Lose 1 Might.
0 Lose 1 Might and 1 Speed.

event-cards.flavor: You feel a body under your foot. Before you can leap away from it, you're knocked over. A giggling voice runs away from you.
event-cards.description: Turn over your item cards (not your omen cards) and shuffle them. The player to your right randomly discards one of them. Then turn your item cards face up again.

event-cards.flavor: Smoke billows around you. You cough, wiping away tears.
event-cards.description: Put the Smoke token in this room. The Smoke blocks line of sight from adjacent rooms. An explorer rolls 2 fewer dice (minimum of 1 die) on all trait rolls while in this room.

event-cards.flavor: Mother and child, still embracing.
event-cards.description:
Put the Skeletons token in this room. Take 1 die of mental damage. Once during an explorer's turn, that explorer can attempt a Sanity roll to search the Skeletons:
5+ Draw an item card. Remove the Skeletons token.
0-4 You dig around, but find nothing. Take 1 die of mental damage.
Each result affects only the explorer making that roll.

event-cards.flavor: A spider the size of a fist lands on your shoulder...and crawls into your hair.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Speed roll to brush it away or a Sanity roll to stand still:
4+ It's gone. Gain 1 in the trait you used to attempt that roll.
1-3 It bites you. Take 1 die of physical damage.
0 It takes a chunk out of you. Take 2 dice of physical damage.

event-cards.flavor: It emerges from the slime on the wall next to you.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Speed roll:
5+ You get away. Gain 1 Speed.
2-4 Take 1 die of mental damage.
0-1 Take 1 die of mental damage and 1 die of physical damage.

event-cards.flavor: It starts like a whisper, but ends in a soul-rending shriek.
event-cards.description:
Each explorer must attempt a Sanity roll.
4+ You resist the sound.
1-3 Take 1 die of mental damage.
0 Take 2 dice of mental damage.
Each result affects only the explorer making that roll.

event-cards.flavor: There's something odd about this room, but what? It's tickling the back of your mind.
event-cards.description:
Attempt a Knowledge roll:
4+ A section of wall slides away, revealing an alcove. Draw and item card.
0-3 You can't figure it out, and that makes you a bit crazy. Lose 1 Sanity.

event-cards.flavor: A man on fire runs through the room. His skin bubbles and cracks, falling away from him and leaving a fiery skull that clatters to the ground, bounces, rolls, and disappears.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Sanity roll:
4+ You feel a little hot under the collar, but otherwise fine. Gain 1 Sanity.
2-3 Out, out, you must get out. Put your explorer in the Entrance Hall.
0-1 You burst into flames! Take 1 die of physical damage. Then take 1 die of mental damage as you put out the flames.

event-cards.flavor: Behind a portrait is a wall safe. It is trapped, of course.
event-cards.description:
Put the safe token in this room. Once during an explorer's turn, that explorer can attempt a Knowledge roll to open the Safe.
5+ Draw 2 item cards and remove the Safe token.
2-4 Take 1 die of physical damage. The Safe won't open.
0-1 Take 2 dice of physical damage. The Safe won't open.

event-cards.flavor: A baby's cry, lost and abandoned. A scream. The crack of breaking glass. Then silence.
event-cards.description: Roll 6 dice. If you roll equal to or more than the number of omens that have been revealed, you gain 1 Sanity. If not, take 1 die of mental damage.

event-cards.flavor: There is an old mirror in this room.
event-cards.description:
Your frightened reflection moves on its own. You realize it is you from another time. Your reflection writes on the mirror:
THIS WILL HELP
Then it hands you an item through the mirror. Draw an item card.

event-cards.flavor: You turn to see a man in groundskeeper clothing. He raises his shovel and charges. Inches from your face, he disappears, leaving muddy footprints, and nothing more.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Knowledge roll. (An explorer in the Gardens rolls 2 fewer dice on this roll.)
4+ You find something in the mud. Draw an item card.
0-3 The groundskeeper reappears and strikes you in the face with the shovel. The player on your right rolls a Might 4 attack for the groundskeeper. You defend against this attack as normal, by rolling dice equal to your Might.

event-cards.flavor: Mists pour out from the walls. There are faces in the mist, human and...inhuman.
event-cards.description:
Each explorer in the basement must attempt a Sanity roll:
4+ The faces are tricks of light and shadow. All is well.
1-3 Take 1 die of mental damage (and 1 additional die of damage if that explorer is in a room with an event symbol).
0 Take 1 die of mental damage (and 2 additional dice of damage if that explorer is in a room with an event symbol).

event-cards.flavor: 'I'm under the floor, buried under the floor...' The voice whispers once, then is gone.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Knowledge roll:
4+ You find something under the floor. Draw an item card.
0-3 You dig and search for the voice, but to no avail.

event-cards.flavor: A phone rings in the room. You feel compelled to answer it.
event-cards.description:
Roll 2 dice. A sweet little granny voice says:
4 'Tea and cakes! Tea and cakes! You always were my favorite!' Gain 1 Sanity.
3 'I'm always here for you, Pattycakes. Watching...' Gain 1 Knowledge.
1-2 'I'm here, Sweetums! Give us a kiss!' Take 1 die of mental damage.
0 'Bad little children must be punished!' Take 2 dice of physical damage.

event-cards.flavor:
A shadow separates from the wall. As you stand in shock, the shadow surrounds you and chills you to the core.
You must choose any one trait and attempt a roll for that trait.
4+ You resist the shadow's corruption. Gain 1 in a trait of your choice.
0-3 The shadow drains your energy. The chosen trait drops to its lowest value. (It doesn't drop to the skull.) If that trait is already at its lowest value, lower a differed trait to its lowest value.
The smell in this room, it's horrible. Smells like death, like blood. A slaugherthouse smell.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Sanity roll:
5+ Troubling odors, nothing more. Gain 1 Sanity.
2-4 Lose 1 Might.
1 Lose 1 Might and 1 Speed.
0 You double over with nausea. Lose 1 Might, 1 Speed, 1 Knowledge, and 1 Sanity.

event-cards.flavor: This room is warm. Flesh-like walls pulse with a steady heartbeat. Your own heart beats with the rhythm of the house. You are drawn into the walls...and emerge somewhere else.
event-cards.description: You must draw the next room tile and put it in the house. Put your explorer in that room.

event-cards.flavor: A breeze chills the room. Before you, three men hand from frayed ropes. They stare at you with cold, dead eyes. The trio swing silently, then fade into dist that falls to the ground. You start to choke.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a roll for each trait: 2+ That trait is unaffected.
0-1 Lose 1 from that trait.
If you roll a 2+ on all 4 rolls, gain 1 additional point in a trait of your choice.

event-cards.flavor: You see an open coffin. You're inside it.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Sanity roll:
You blink, and it's gone. Gain 1 Sanity.
2-3 The vision disturbs you. Lose 1 Sanity.
You're really in that coffin. Lose 1 Sanity and 1 Might as you dig yourself out. If the Graveyard or the Crypt has been found, put your explorer in one of those rooms (you choose which one).

event-cards.flavor: A thousand bugs spill out on your skin, under your clothes, and in your hair.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Sanity roll:
5+ You block, and they're gone. Gain 1 sanity.
1-4 Lose 1 Sanity.
0 Lose 2 Sanity.

event-cards.flavor: The closet door is open...just a crack. There must be somethig inside.
event-cards.description:
Put the Closet token in this room. Once during an explorer's turn, that explorer can roll 2 dice to open the Closet.
4 Draw an item card.
2-3 Draw an event card.
0-1 Draw an event card and remove the Closet token.

event-cards.flavor: The walls of this room are damp with blood. The blood drips from the ceiling, down the walls, over the furniture, and onto your shoes. In a blink, it is gone.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Sanity roll:
4+ You steel yourself. Gain 1 sanity.
2-3 Lose 1 Sanity.
0-1 If an explorer or monster is in your room or an adjacent one, you must attack it (if you can). Choose the explorer with the lowest Might, if possible.

event-cards.flavor: You see a vision of a ghostly couple walking the grounds silently strolling in their wedding best.
event-cards.description:
You must attempt a Knowledge roll:
5+ You recognize the ghosts as former inhabitants of the house. You call their names, and they turn to you, whispering dark secrets of the house. Gain 1 Knowledge.
0-1 You pull back in horror, unable to watch.
